descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: It only takes Draymond Green and Steve Kerr three minutes to receive technical fouls for mouthing off to the referees.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Draymond, Kerr get T'd up less than 3 minutes into the game) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Draymond, Kerr get T'd up less than 3 minutes into the game

videos.description: Steph Curry somehow gets a tough layup to fall over Domantas Sabonis.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Steph hits wild reverse lay-in on Sabonis) 2021/12/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Steph hits wild reverse lay-in on Sabonis

videos.description: Pacers convert the Warriors' turnovers into buckets on back-to-back possessions.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Warriors call timeout after Pacers nail consecutive baskets) 2021/12/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Warriors call timeout after Pacers nail consecutive baskets

videos.description: Steph Curry knocks down the 3-pointer to close in on Ray Allen's record.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Steph drains his first 3 of the night) 2021/12/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Steph drains his first 3 of the night

videos.description: Draymond Green kicks out to Steph Curry for a 3-pointer while falling.
videos.headline: Steph drops in off-balance 3

videos.description: Steph Curry hits his third 3-pointer of the night.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Steph inches closer to Ray Allen's record with third 3) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Steph inches closer to Ray Allen's record with third 3

videos.description: Steph Curry drains his fourth 3-pointer of the night just inside the logo.
videos.headline: Steph's 4th 3 is from deep

videos.description: Steph Curry's fifth 3-pointer gets the Warriors within two points of the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Steph comes up huge for Warriors with 5th 3 of night) 2021/12/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Steph comes up huge for Warriors with 5th 3 of night

videos.description: Caris LeVert loses the ball late in the fourth quarter trying to drive for a game-tying basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeVert makes costly turnover late in game for Pacers) 2021/12/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeVert makes costly turnover late in game for Pacers

videos.description: Steph Curry nails five 3-pointers in the Warriors' win to inch closer to surpassing Ray Allen's record.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Steph drains five 3-pointers, two away from surpassing Ray Allen's record) 2021/12/14 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Steph drains five 3-pointers, two away from surpassing Ray Allen's record
